data.title: Carlos Thompson Scoggin
data.text:
Carlos Thompson Scoggin1

M, #11350, (29 Nov 1855 - )

Carlos Thompson Scoggin|b. 29 Nov 1855|p11350.htm|William Gustavus Scoggin|b. 13 Oct 1832\nd. Jun 1892|p6110.htm|Amanda 'Mandy' Elizabeth Grubb||p11318.htm|Woodson P. Scoggin|b. 26 Feb 1807\nd. 25 Jan 1840|p6115.htm|Mary 'Polly' Greene|b. 11 Aug 1809\nd. 21 Mar 1890|p6114.htm|||||||

Father: William Gustavus Scoggin1 b. 13 Oct 1832, d. Jun 1892

Mother: Amanda 'Mandy' Elizabeth Grubb1

Relationship: 6th great-grandson of Johan Schaggen.

Last Edited: 21 Mar 2003

Birth: 29 Nov 1855.2,1

(Parents, William Gustavus Scoggin & Amanda 'Mandy' Elizabeth Grubb).1

Marriage: 6 Oct 1883, Mary E. Buffington.1

Children with Mary E. Buffington :

Thompie Scoggin 1

Clara Scoggin 1

Eston Scoggin 1

Woodson P. Scoggin 1

Mary Scoggin 1

Shirley Sylvester Scoggin (1896 - )1
